"""
I notice we keep having issues with the distance to the drill. Let's try a simpler approach
by moving directly to the drill first and building a short segment at a time.
"""

# First get resources and craft
move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.IronOre), quantity=100)

move_to(nearest(Resource.Coal))
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Coal), quantity=50)

# Smelt iron plates
print("Smelting iron plates...")
move_to(furnace1.position)
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace1, quantity=50)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace1, quantity=10)
sleep(15)
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace1.position, quantity=50)

# Craft components
print("Crafting components...")
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=5)
craft_item(Prototype.TransportBelt, quantity=30)
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerInserter, quantity=2)

def place_belt_segment(start_pos, count, direction):
    """Place a short segment of belts"""
    current = start_pos
    move_to(current)  # Ensure we're in range
    
    for i in range(count):
        if direction == "right":
            next_pos = Position(x=current.x + 1, y=current.y)
            belt_dir = Direction.RIGHT
        elif direction == "left":
            next_pos = Position(x=current.x - 1, y=current.y)
            belt_dir = Direction.LEFT
        elif direction == "up":
            next_pos = Position(x=current.x, y=current.y + 1)
            belt_dir = Direction.UP
        else:  # down
            next_pos = Position(x=current.x, y=current.y - 1)
            belt_dir = Direction.DOWN
            
        belt = place_entity(
            Prototype.TransportBelt,
            position=next_pos,
            direction=belt_dir
        )
        assert belt, f"Failed to place belt at {next_pos}"
        current = next_pos
        
        if i % 3 == 2:  # Move every 3 belts to stay in range
            move_to(current)
    
    return current

# Start from the drill
print("Moving to drill...")
move_to(drill.position)
current_pos = drill.drop_position

# Build in short segments
print("Building belt line...")
try:
    # Move down from drill first
    current_pos = place_belt_segment(current_pos, 5, "down")
    move_to(current_pos)
    
    # Move right towards furnace
    current_pos = place_belt_segment(current_pos, 8, "right")
    move_to(current_pos)
    
    # Move down again
    current_pos = place_belt_segment(current_pos, 5, "down")
    move_to(current_pos)
    
    # Final approach to furnace
    current_pos = place_belt_segment(current_pos, 5, "right")
    
except Exception as e:
    print(f"Error during belt placement: {e}")
    print(f"Last position was: {current_pos}")

# Place inserter near furnace
print("Placing furnace inserter...")
move_to(furnace1.position)
furnace_inserter = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    position=Position(x=furnace1.position.x - 1, y=furnace1.position.y),
    direction=Direction.RIGHT
)
assert furnace_inserter, "Failed to place furnace inserter"

# Fuel everything
print("Adding fuel to entities...")
move_to(drill.position)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)

move_to(furnace_inserter.position)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace_inserter, quantity=5)

move_to(furnace1.position)
insert_item
